ext.ext_cn: 要么用浴用温度计测量水温，要么用手腕试一下。
ext.ext_en: Either measure the temperature with a bath thermometer or test the water with your wrist...

ext.ext_cn: 军方在这儿有发射场，“长剑”导弹等武器都在这里进行试验。
ext.ext_en: Here the army has its ranges where Rapier missiles and other weaponry are tested...

defs.def_en: When you test something, you try it, for example by touching it or using it for a short time, in order to find out what it is, what condition it is in, or how well it works.
A test is a deliberate action or experiment to find out how well something works.

ext.ext_cn: 曾经，每个老师每周都有一天花上一小时对学生的每门功课进行测试。
ext.ext_en: There was a time when each teacher spent an hour, one day a week, testing pupils in every subject...

ext.ext_cn: 她决定在伦敦对自己进行跑步训练的测试。
ext.ext_en: She decided to test herself with a training run in London.

defs.def_en: If you test someone, you ask them questions or tell them to perform certain actions in order to find out how much they know about a subject or how well they are able to do something.

ext.ext_cn: 所有 2,602 名学生中，只有 922 名通过了测试。
ext.ext_en: Out of a total of 2,602 pupils only 922 passed the test...

ext.ext_cn: 她卖了自行车，考了驾照，并买了辆汽车。
ext.ext_en: She had sold her bike, taken a driving test and bought a car.

defs.def_en: A test is a series of questions that you must answer or actions that you must perform in order to show how much you know about a subject or how well you are able to do something.

ext.ext_cn: 她可能在试探她妈妈，看她能忍耐到什么程度才会把她撵出家门。
ext.ext_en: She may be testing her mother to see how much she can take before she throws her out.

defs.def_en: If you test someone, you deliberately make things difficult for them in order to see how they react.

ext.ext_cn: 度假对任何恋爱关系都是重大考验，这是常识。
ext.ext_en: It is a commonplace fact that holidays are a major test of any relationship...

ext.ext_cn: 检验一个社会是否文明的办法就是看它怎样对待其少数群体。
ext.ext_en: The test of any civilised society is how it treats its minorities.

defs.def_en: If an event or situation is a test of a person or thing, it reveals their qualities or effectiveness.

ext.ext_cn: 我的医生要我去做个检查，看是否患有糖尿病。
ext.ext_en: My doctor wants me to be tested for diabetes...

ext.ext_cn: 染病家庭的女孩们也可以检查一下，看看是否携带这种缺陷基因。
ext.ext_en: Girls in an affected family can also be tested to see if they carry the defective gene.

defs.def_en: If you are tested for a particular disease or medical condition, you are examined or go through various procedures in order to find out whether you have that disease or condition.

ext.ext_cn: 如有必要，还要进行 X 光检查和验血以帮助诊断。
ext.ext_en: If necessary X-rays and blood tests will also be used to aid diagnosis...

ext.ext_cn: 家庭医生安排了名目繁多、收费昂贵的检查，结果没有查出任何健康问题。
ext.ext_en: The family doctor ordered numerous, expensive medical tests, which revealed no physical problem.

defs.def_en: A medical test is an examination of a part of your body in order to check that you are healthy or to find out what is wrong with you.

defs.def_cn: (常指板球、橄榄球的)国际锦标赛
defs.def_en: A test is a sports match between two international teams, usually in cricket, rugby union, or rugby league.

defs.def_cn: 使经受检验;对…进行试验

ext.ext_cn: 利物浦队此时正在验证他们的理论。
ext.ext_en: The Liverpool team are now putting their theory to the test...

ext.ext_cn: 到了火车站，为了检验自己对当地的了解程度，我请教了一个出租车司机。
ext.ext_en: Arriving at the railway station, I put local knowledge to the test and ask a taxi driver.

defs.def_en: If you put something to the test, you find out how useful or effective it is by using it.

ext.ext_cn: 总有一天，生活会考验这种关系是否牢固。
ext.ext_en: Sooner or later, life will put the relationship to the test.

defs.def_en: If new circumstances or events put something to the test, they put a strain on it and indicate how strong or stable it really is.

ext.ext_cn: 她的许多食谱经受住了时间的考验，这充分证明了她的厨艺。
ext.ext_en: It says a lot for her culinary skills that so many of her recipes have stood the test of time.

defs.def_en: If you say that something will stand the test of time, you mean that it is strong or effective enough to last for a very long time.
